title: My Friend Asmodeus
description: Ever wonder what you would do if you were suddenly granted ultimate power? Would you control people you don't know? Or would you alter the known world with this divine might? Here's the catch... what if this power wasn't exactly 'good' in nature?William is a bitter, unexciting guy transformed into a mindless drone by years of retail work... that is, until he begins hearing an otherworldly voice in his brain. Join him on a twisted tale of raunchy fun as this demonic voice commands William to embrace his dark side and work towards something greater than he'd ever imagined.
author: Nathan Barnes
